TopicTitle: Where in the forum can I see details of the 1.0.1 & 1.0.2 patches?

Articles.Content:
I saw threads like ksapervid's '1.0.1 is under dev' which closed with 'it's done closing the thread'. And I can see people talking about various aspects of the patches.

I couldn't find squad official 'here is the patch and here is whats in it' thread.

Can you please let me know where i can see that info?
Articles tab, top of the forum ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
